title: DataConfig
description: Defines the data configuration for the NeuronBridge.

anatomicalAreas.title: Anatomical areas
anatomicalAreas.description: Anatomical areas that can be searched.

stores.title: Data stores
stores.description: A data store provides access to imagery for a given subset of images.

AnatomicalArea.title: AnatomicalArea
AnatomicalArea.description: Defines an anatomical areas of the fly brain that can be searched using NeuronBridge. All searches are specific to one area.

label.title: Anatomical area label
label.description: Label used for the anatomical area in the UI.

alignmentSpace.title: Alignment space
alignmentSpace.description: Alignment space to which this images in this area are registered.

CustomSearchConfig.title: CustomSearchConfig
CustomSearchConfig.description: Configuration for the custom search on a data set.

searchFolder.title: Search folder
searchFolder.description: Name of sub-folder on S3 to traverse when using custom search.

lmLibraries.title: List of LM libraries
lmLibraries.description: List of the identifiers of LM libraries included in this data set.

emLibraries.title: List of EM libraries
emLibraries.description: List of the identifiers of EM libraries included in this data set.

DataStore.title: DataStore
DataStore.description: Configuration for a data store. This allows some flexibility for defining the S3 locations for various file types.

label.title: Data set label
label.description: Label used for the data set in the UI.

anatomicalArea.title: Anatomical area name
anatomicalArea.description: Internal identifier for the anatomical area used for this data set. Can be used to look up additional details by matching to AnatomicalArea.value.

prefixes.title: Prefixes
prefixes.description: Path prefixes for each file type in Files. If no prefix exists for a given file type, then the path should be treated as absolute.

customSearch.title: Custom search
customSearch.description: Custom search configuration for this data set.
